ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, btw.. I m not suggesting that Bards are absolutely required.  We ll never be as desired as Clerics, Warriors or Rogues.  I m just stating that Bards can be
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, btw.. I'm not suggesting that Bards are absolutely required. We'll never be as desired as Clerics, Warriors or Rogues. I'm just stating that Bards can be put to use in a significant role.

Darkfox
Xegony


Well Dark you wouldn't being experiencing anything if you weren't on the
raid. And if you weren't on the raid, the raid wouldn't be noticing
anything different either. You need, "need" not want, 1 bard on a raid.
Any more bards would be better replaced by another class.

Shada/Erisi


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
